text: Patricia Jude Francis Kensit (born 4 March 1968) is a British actress, model, and singer. She was born in Hounslow, London to an Irish mother and English father. Kensit's movie roles include Absolute Beginners, Lethal Weapon 2 and Twenty-One. She acted in soap opera Emmerdale from 2004–2006 and in medical drama Holby City from 2007–2010. Kensit was a contestant in the 2010 series of Strictly Come Dancing. She is a housemate in the January 2015 series of Celebrity Big Brother (UK). Kensit is a Roman Catholic.My family values She has been married to four musicians: Dan Donovan (1988–1991), Jim Kerr (1992–1996), Liam Gallagher (1997–2000) and Jeremy Healy (2009–2010). The first three marriages ended in divorce. She is separated from her fourth husband. She has two sons - one by Kerr and one by Gallagher. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Actors from London Category:British child actors Category:Celebrity Big Brother contestants Category:English movie actors Category:English pop singers Category:English Roman Catholics Category:English singers Category:English television actors Category:People from the London Borough of Hounslow Category:Singers from London Category:Strictly Come Dancing participants Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Patsy Kensit
